widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (45,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0,5),size = (60,38),font = 0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 1),# key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (68,5),size = (98,38),font = 0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 2),# number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (173,5),size = (195,38),font = 0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 3),# description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (375,5),size = (330,38),font = 0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 4),# language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (728,5),size = (30,38),font = 1,flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT,text = 5),# selection, ],True,"showNever"), "notselected": (45,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0,5),size = (60,38),font = 0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 1),# key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (68,5),size = (98,38),font = 0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 2),# number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (173,5),size = (195,38),font = 0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 3),# description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (375,5),size = (330,38),font = 0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 4),# language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (728,5),size = (30,38),font = 1,flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT,text = 5),# selection, ],False,"showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular",30),gFont("Regular",24)], "itemHeight": 45 }

screen.name: ChoiceBox
screen.title: Input
screen.applet: # this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() # y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 80,textsize[1] + 80) count = len(self.list) if count >10: count = 10 offset = 48 * count wsizex = textsize[0] + 80 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset + 45 if (975 >wsizex): wsizex = 975 wsize = (wsizex,wsizey) # resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) # resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) # move list listsize = (wsizex - 32,48 * count) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) # center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint((1920-wsizex)/2,(1080-wsizey)/2))

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: # this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 90,textsize[1] + 90) offset = 42 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 140 wsizex = textsize[0] + 140 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (420 >wsizex): wsizex = 420 wsize = (wsizex,wsizey) # resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) # resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) # move list listsize = (wsizex - 30,140) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) # center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))

screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: # this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 120,textsize[1] + 120) offset = 42 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 170 wsizex = textsize[0] + 170 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (420 >wsizex): wsizex = 420 wsize = (wsizex,wsizey) # resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) # resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) # move list listsize = (wsizex - 30,170) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) # center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))

screen.name: ExtraMessageBox

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (12, 28), size = (72, 72), png = 0), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (143, 29), size = (1025, 86), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 1), ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 34)], "itemHeight": 110 }

screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["message"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... if self["message"].getText() != "": textsize = (textsize[0] + 180, textsize[1] + 135) else: textsize = (textsize[0] + 180, textsize[1] + 9)
count = len(self.list) if count > 5: count = 5 offset = 110 * count wsizex = textsize[0] + 180 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset + 45
if (1035 > wsizex): wsizex = 1035 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["message"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 45, 110 * count) self["menu"].downstream_elements.downstream_elements.instance.move(ePoint(23, textsize[1] + 23)) self["menu"].downstream_elements.downstream_elements.instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] newheight = wsize[1] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y() + (orgheight - newheight)/2))
